0.5.1.name: wordpress/wp-require-login
0.5.1.description: A simple plugin for Wordpress that redirects users to the login page whenever they try to visit any page/post/etc on the blog, with an option menu to turn this functionality on or off. When enabled, the entire blog essentially becomes a private blog.
